div.p: Average food supply (kilocalorie per person per day) in 2010 and 2050, by region and scenario. Note: The line at 1800 represents the daily minimum requirement. The black line at 2.400 represents recommended daily consumption of an active 20 to 35-year-old female and the line at 3000 represents the recommended daily consumption of an active 20–35 year old male ( USDA, 2015).
